mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MAX(idx.rows) FROM SYSINDEXES as idx INNER JOIN SYSOBJECTS AS obj ON (idx.id = obj.id) WHERE (obj.type = 'U') AND (obj.name = 'tb_shipping_mtm')

SELECT maintb.mtm_seq /* mtm일련번호 */ , maintb.shipping_key /* 업체코드 */ , maintb.pre_storage_loc /* 저장위치(변경전) */ , maintb.modi_meterial_num /* 수정품번 */ , maintb.modi_qty /* 수정수량 */ , maintb.storage_loc /* 저장위치(변경후) */ , maintb.process_id /* 처리자아이디 */ , maintb.modify_id /* 수정자아이디 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(19), maintb.modify_dt, 20) as modify_dt /* 수정일자 */ , subtb1.accept_dt as accept_dt /* 발주일자 */ , subtb1.shipping_method as shipping_method /* 출하방법 */ , subtb1.supply_qty as supply_qty /* 납품수량 */ , subtb1.remain_qty as remain_qty /* 잔여수량 */ , subtb1.supply_dt as supply_dt /* 남품일자 */ FROM tb_shipping_mtm where maintb.shipping_key = #{shipping_key}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_shipping_mtm ( shipping_key, material_num, pre_storage_loc, modi_meterial_num, modi_qty, storage_loc, process_id, modify_id, modify_dt ) values ( #{shipping_key}, #{material_num}, #{pre_storage_loc}, #{modi_meterial_num}, #{modi_qty}, #{storage_loc}, #{process_id}, #{modify_id}, getdate() )
SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('tb_shipping_mtm')
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_shipping_mtm
pre_storage_loc = #{pre_storage_loc}, modi_meterial_num = #{modi_meterial_num}, modi_qty = #{modi_qty}, storage_loc = #{storage_loc}, modify_id = #{modify_id},
,modify_dt = getdate()
and mtm_seq = #{mtm_seq}
mapper.select: select tot.modi_meterial_num , tot.pre_storage_loc , tot.original_qty , tot.lastmmt_qty , isnull(c.storage_loc,'') as storage_loc , isnull(c.modi_qty,'') as modi_qty from ( select #{shipping_key} as shipping_key , a.MATNR as modi_meterial_num , a.LGORT as pre_storage_loc , SUM(a.LABST) as original_qty , SUM(a.LABST) - ISNULL(SUM(ts.modi_qty),0) as lastmmt_qty from ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARD a inner join ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARA b on a.MATNR = b.MATNR left outer join ( select modi_meterial_num,pre_storage_loc,SUM(modi_qty)as modi_qty from ( select t1.* from TB_SHIPPING tt inner join tb_shipping_mtm t1 on tt.shipping_key = t1.shipping_key where tt.PROCESS_CD in('ST_CFM','ST_ING') ) tot group by modi_meterial_num,pre_storage_loc ) ts on a.MATNR COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = ts.modi_meterial_num and a.LGORT COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = ts.pre_storage_loc where b.MTART = 'FERT' and a.LABST > 0 and LEFT(a.MATNR,LEN(a.MATNR)-2) =LEFT(#{material_num},LEN(#{material_num})-2) and a.MATNR != #{material_num} group by a.MATNR, a.LGORT ) tot left outer join tb_shipping_mtm c on tot.shipping_key = c.shipping_key and tot.pre_storage_loc COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = c.pre_storage_loc order by tot.modi_meterial_num, tot.pre_storage_loc

select a.MATNR as modi_meterial_num , a.LGORT as storage_loc , SUM(a.LABST) as modi_qty from ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARD a inner join ERP_DL.WJP.wjp.MARA b on a.MATNR = b.MATNR where a.LABST > 0 and a.MATNR = #{material_num} group by a.MATNR, a.LGORT
